dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: A modern, comprehensive, real-world dataset with over 5000 images, divided into 15 different industrial object and texture category classes. Each class consists of non-defective data and a range of different types of defective data, such as bent, broken, and contaminated surfaces.
dcterms:title: MVTec Anomaly Detection Dataset (MVTec AD)

dcterms:creator: B. Staar
M. LÃ¼tjen
M. Freitag
dcterms:description: Utilizes Gaussian noise to synthesize defective samples from non-defective images and employs a residual-based triplet network for anomaly detection.
